entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
